Overview  Service  Command 

ZimbraTM SOAP API Reference 8.6.0_GA_1159

This document is the reference specification for the Zimbra SOAP API.

SOAP API Services
zimbraAccount The Account Service includes commands for retrieving, storing and managing user account information.
zimbraAdmin The Admin Service includes commands for administering Zimbra.
zimbraAdminExt The Admin Extension Service includes additional commands for administering Zimbra.
zimbraMail The Mail Service includes commands for managing mail and calendar information.
zimbraRepl The zimbraRepl Service includes commands for managing Zimbra Server replication.
zimbraSync The zimbraSync Service includes commands for managing devices using Synchronization.
zimbraVoice The zimbraVoice Service includes commands related to Unified Communications.
